    io.odysz.semantic.DASemantext.pagingSql(dbtype, String, int, int)
    replaced by Connects.pagingSql(dbtype, String, int, int)
    io.odysz.semantic.DASemantics.replaceMeta(String, TableMeta, String...)
    since 2.0.0, to have a meta be the type of SemanticTableMeta, configure the class name in semantics.xml/t[id=metas], instead of calling this method.
    io.odysz.semantic.util.DAHelper.count_(DATranscxt, String, String, String, String)
    replaced by DAHelper.count(DATranscxt, String, String, Object...)
    io.odysz.semantic.util.DAHelper.loadRecLong(DATranscxt, String, TableMeta, String, String)
    call DAHelper.getValong(DATranscxt, String, TableMeta, String, String...), e.g. getValong(t, m, target-field, m.pk, recId, ...).
